Html:
ï»¿What is WPF, and does it for creating an application that is both good for windows form, and web application?

Nevertheless, how can I convert my windows from win-form to wpf?

(Also looking for a way to convert from win-form to web-form).

I didn't find any code I can download - Where can I find a link of download.

 

Thanks :)

To download source code:

  1. From the project’s Home page, click the Source Code tab.
  2. Select the source code you want to download
  3. Click Download next to the Change Set title.
  4. Click I agree at the bottom of the license agreement to begin downloading the source code file.
